column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Went here for the first time EVER today! I'm from Minnesota and have been to chicago about 8 times and never have gone to any location of Lou Malnati's. Not only does it have the most delicious
column3: but also has the most inviting
column4: kind staff! Seriously the staff were so attentive. I mean
column5: Chicago is a hit or miss with restaurants
column6: but this one was my favorite. They said our pizza would take around 45 minutes
column7: it took about 25 which was awesome. Our waiter refilled our waters multiple times
column8: and my coke with a lemon. Also
column9: I had the best pizza I have ever had. Best day ever!
